persona.name: Mason Carter

occupation.title: Stay-at-home dad
occupation.description: You are currently a stay-at-home dad, focusing on raising your two young children. You manage the household, take care of daily chores, and engage in activities with your kids. While you once worked in retail, you decided to prioritize family after your marriage. You often think about re-entering the workforce but feel uncertain about balancing work and family life.

persona.education: Some college education, with a focus on business management. Attended community college but did not complete a degree due to family obligations.
long_term_goals: To provide a stable and loving environment for my children.
To eventually return to school and complete my degree.
To start a small business that allows me to work from home and spend more time with my family.
